snippet: North Carolina's state Senate on Wednesday unanimously approved a bill calling for the closure of Duke Energy's 33 coal ash ponds in the state within 15 years, legislation spurred by a massive spill at a retired power plant earlier this year....

headline.print_headline: North Carolina Lawmakers Order Coal Ash Pond Cleanup After Duke Spill
headline.main: North Carolina Lawmakers Order Coal Ash Pond Cleanup After Duke Spill

lead_paragraph: North Carolina's state Senate on Wednesday unanimously approved a bill calling for the closure of Duke Energy's 33 coal ash ponds in the state within 15 years, legislation spurred by a massive spill at a retired power plant earlier this year.
